QuestData.Title: Trophy of Glory: Khargax the Devourer
QuestData.Description: Defeating Khargax has yielded you a trophy worthy of showing off at your outpost. $b$bReturn this to Maraad to increase your glory!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the trophy to Maraad at Highpass in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done us all a great favor $p.$b$bThe existence of that slippery hydra wasn't even truly known despite our losses in the area.
